title: Rare tropical fungus randomly blooms in the palm of a US teen’s hand
description: The alarming fungal growth looks a lot like cancer, but is harmless and easy to treat.

title: US court rules, once again, that AI software can’t invent a patent
description: Stephen Thaler's quest for legal recognition of AI authorship hits another roadblock.

title: GMC unveils its first electric truck, the Sierra EV, due in early 2024
description: It starts at a serious $107K, but GMC says a $50K version will arrive in time.

title: Texas compares Google to “Eye of Sauron,” sues over biometric data collection
description: TX: Google records "faces and voices of both non-consenting users and non-users."

title: Microsoft leaked 2.4TB of data belonging to sensitive customer. Critics are furious
description: Data includes signed contracts and projects related to critical infrastructure.

title: After heatwaves, utilities disconnect more people due to nonpayment
description: Each individual hot day has a small effect, but they can add up—and it will get worse.

title: Anti-vaccine groups avoid Facebook bans by using emojis
description: Pizza slices, cupcakes, and peaches among emojis hijacked.

title: Cherry’s new mechanical switch is based off an 11-year-old forum post
description: Cherry's MX Ergo Clear switches are like tactile Browns, but lighter.

title: Starry Internet cuts 500 jobs—half its workforce—and cancels big expansion
description: Starry once planned to cover 40 million homes, currently has just 91,000 users.

title: Adobe plays catch-up with Project Blink, an AI-powered video editor
description: AI video editor can recognize objects, people, and sounds, allowing editing via text.

title: Smugglers are using TikTok, Instagram to dupe Americans into smuggling migrants
description: Border Patrol agent says 90% of drivers arrested were recruited on social media.

title: Vampire Survivors—a cheap, minimalistic indie game—is my game of the year
description: The popular indie darling is out of Early Access—and it’s a no-brainer pickup.

title: 74% say connected cars and EV chargers need cybersecurity ratings
description: There's a new EnergyStar-like label program for connected devices—but not cars.

title: Why are racing cars driving up and down an abandoned railway tunnel?
description: Built in 1897, the 1.7-mile Catesby Tunnel is now an alternative to a wind tunnel.

title: Intel i9-13900K and i5-13600K review: Beating AMD at its own game
description: AMD's tech is ahead of the curve, but Raptor Lake swamps Ryzen with E-cores.
